articles.description: If you were to greet a Neanderthal with a handshake, it might feel a little awkward. Homo neanderthalensis had chunkier fingers compared to human digits -- and used their hands differently from us, a new study suggests.

articles.title: Hong Kong protester jailed for throwing eggs as city's judiciary comes under increasing pressure
articles.description: A 31-year-old man has been jailed for 21 months for throwing eggs at a police station, the latest tough sentence handed down by a Hong Kong court as the authorities move to clamp down on political dissent in the Chinese territory.
